meanings.definition: A thrilling and suspenseful story or movie that is exceptionally exciting and intense.
meanings.sent1: The superthriller kept me on the edge of my seat until the very end.
meanings.sent2: I love watching a good superthriller with unexpected plot twists.
meanings.sent3: The superthriller had me biting my nails in anticipation of what would happen next.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a superthriller, full of unexpected turns and heart-pounding moments.
meanings.sent5: The superthriller left a lasting impression on me with its gripping storyline.

meanings.definition: To create or produce a superthriller, typically in the form of a novel or film.
meanings.sent1: The author worked tirelessly to superthriller the pages of his new book.
meanings.sent2: She hoped to superthriller a movie that would captivate audiences worldwide.
meanings.sent3: Attempting to superthriller a story from scratch was both challenging and exciting.
meanings.sent4: His imagination soared as he set out to superthriller a tale of mystery and intrigue.
meanings.sent5: The director's goal was to superthriller a film that would leave viewers breathless.
